TERMS AND CONDITIONS


These terms and conditions are agreements between you (USER) and Red Social de Salud MHL, S. de R.L. de C.V. hereinafter "MY HEALTH LIFE" with an address located at Calle Campestre 7651-C, Fracc. Zermeño, CP 22120, Tijuana City, Mexico, and with email contacto@myhealthlife.com.


The services that will be provided to you and covered under the My Health Life brand are the following:

 Provide intermediation services through the My Health Life mobile application requesting this provision of medical services. Thus, benefits could be via telemedicine, a health service provider's office, or remote care managing your health care.


USE OF SERVICES


My Health Life is a health technology platform that can be downloaded for Android Operating systems (multiple brands), iOS (Apple) mobile devices, or any other system. Hereinafter "APP," who owns the rights to the MY HEALTH LIFE software.


BASIC REQUIREMENTS FOR USE:


For the use of the My Health Life mobile application, the creation of a user account is required, as well as a mobile device with Internet access with the latest version of the Android or iOS operating system.


CREATING AN ACCOUNT. You may create an account by registering on the mobile application, so you agree not to register false, inaccurate, or misleading information at the time of registration.


To protect your account, keep your account secure username and password details confidential. You are responsible for all activities that you perform for each and all activities within this service.


ACCOUNT USAGE. To keep your account active, you need to use it constantly. You must log in at least once in five (5) years to keep your account active. In the case we reasonably suspect that a third party is using your account fraudulently (for example, due to an account reconciliation). In that case, MY HEALTH LIFE may suspend your account until you can claim ownership. It depends on the nature of the engagement and risk; we may ask you to disable access to some or all your content.


TERMINATION /CANCELLATION OF AN ACCOUNT You may cancel the services at any time by notifying us by email, referring your account to these terms and conditions, and requesting the withdrawal from the system to all users registered under your account.


If you breach these terms, you hereby authorize MY HEALTH LIFE, in its sole discretion, to stop providing the services to you or to close or inactivate your account.


DATA PLANS: For any of the Services, you will need an Internet connection and/or a data plan on your cell phone. You are responsible for providing all connections, plans, and equipment necessary to use the Services and for paying any fees charged to you by the provider(s) of your connections, plans, and equipment. These charges are in addition to any other expenses you pay for the Services and are not refundable, which do not constitute a liability to MY HEALTH LIFE.


DEFINITIONS


THE INTERMEDIARY: Refers to the exclusive platform rights owner and the operator of the INTERMEDIATION SYSTEM, KNOWN AS MY HEALTH LIFE.


The defined name for My Health Life is a mobile application that provides intermediation services for the PATIENT. These are requesting and receiving from the doctor the provision of medical services via telemedicine or face-to-face visit to the service provider facilities of the MY HEALTH LIFE network. Likewise, MY HEALTH LIFE may be, under the terms of this contract of TERMS AND CONDITIONS, a provider of health information services and intermediary in the areas with availability, including but not limited to laboratory care services of chemical analysis, imaging, pathology, pharmacies, outpatient services, hospitalization, dentistry, nutrition, DNA analysis, and any other health service.


MY HEALTH LIFE serves exclusively as a link or intermediary, the Service provided by MY HEALTH LIFE is to make available medical and /or health services to the user.


DOCTOR: Refers to the doctor enrolled in MY HEALTH LIFE and authorized Service to be contacted by the PATIENT.


THE DOCTOR is responsible for the Patient's diagnosis, treatment, prescription, and medication.


PATIENT: It is the person who is registered in the profile of the USER and receives the provision of medical services through MY HEALTH LIFE.


SERVICE PROVIDER is the establishment and/or person that provides the health service, such as laboratory care services of chemical analysis, imaging, pathology, pharmacies, outpatient services, hospitalization, dentistry, nutrition, DNA analysis, and any other health service.


USER: It is the person who registers on the platform and requests, within the MY HEALTH LIFE mobile application, the provision of services within the MY HEALTH LIFE technological platform.


MY HEALTH LIFE NETWORK: Refers to the network of PHYSICIANS AND/OR SERVICE PROVIDERS AFFILIATED with the MY HEALTH LIFE mobile application.


CLINICAL SUMMARY is the document prepared by a doctor in the MY HEALTH LIFE system. The relevant aspects of a patient's medical care are recorded and contained in the electronic medical records.


MEDICAL CARE is the set of FIRST-LEVEL services that the DOCTOR provides to the PATIENT to promote, protect, and restore their health.


URGENCY: To any acute medical-surgical problem that endangers life, an organ, or a function requires immediate attention due to the consultation.


EXTERNAL CONSULTATION OR FIRST LEVEL: The general or specialized medical attention of the PATIENT called on an outpatient basis, in an office, or in the home of the same, which consists of carrying out interrogation and physical examination to integrate a diagnosis.


FIRST-TIME CONSULTATION: To the attention granted by the DOCTOR to the PATIENT when he goes to the first consultation for a disease or specific reason during the visit at the site.


SUBSEQUENT CONSULTATION: This is granted to a person by health personnel when attending for the same illness or health reason for which a given consultation.


CONSULTATION OFFICE: The physical area has facilities and necessary equipment for medical and paramedical personnel to provide outpatient consultation.


A MEDICAL PROCEDURE is a set of activities carried out by the doctor or health personnel for the specific prevention and non-surgical diagnosis of diseases, injuries, or other health-related problems.


VIRTUAL ELECTRONIC WALLET: Credit reserved to the Patient's account for refunds, promotions, or used payments in consultations or subsequent services. The VIRTUAL ELECTRONIC WALLET service may or may not be available in specific areas for the user.


TELECARE: It is the consultation via video conference via Internet, carried out through a computer, smartphone, or tablet on the side of the Patient or user. (This Telecare could have a defined time selected or could have open time) and will depend on the capabilities of the connection, the location of the Patient, and the contracted data plan.


MY HEALTH LIFE informs you that if you require emergency medical attention, you must go directly to the hospital's emergency department of the social security services you have, freeing MY HEALTH LIFE from any responsibility from this moment.


F. CANCELLATION OF APPOINTMENT


Refunds will not occur when a patient is unavailable or refuses to receive a consultation on a scheduled appointment.


PRIVACY


For these services, we will collect your personal information.


You agree that the information provided to "MY HEALTH LIFE" is accurate, complete, relevant, correct, and up-to-date, releasing "MY HEALTH LIFE" from any liability arising from the breach of this obligation.


CODE OF CONDUCT


By accepting these Terms, you agree that when using the Services, you will follow these rules:


a) You will not engage in conduct that violates domestic and/or foreign laws.

 b) You will not engage in activities that infringe on the privacy or personal data protection rights of others.

 c) You will refrain from copying, redistributing, reproducing, transferring, displaying to the public, transmitting, or making available to the public any part of the Service, or its content, in any way or another that is not expressly indicated in these terms and conditions.

 d) Use computer engineering knowledge or hacking to modify or create works based on the MY HEALTH LIFE platform, its content, or any part thereof.

 e) Sell, rent and/or assign any part of the Service or its content without the consent of "MY HEALTH LIFE" services.

 f) It prohibits the use of a username and password of another person or allows the use of your user by a third party.


UPDATES TO THE SERVICES OR SOFTWARE AND CHANGES TO THESE TERMS.


These terms and conditions may be modified at any time, and we will notify you when minor or significant changes are made to these TERMS AND CONDITIONS. Using the Services after the changes become effective and you have been notified means that You accept the new terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop using the services and, if applicable, close your account.


We may automatically review the application of the use of the services and make updates or changes in the configuration, where such updates are subject to these terms.


In addition, it may sometimes be necessary to remove or change features or functionalities of the Service or directly stop providing a service or access to applications.


We may release the services or some of their features in a new version that may not work correctly or in the same way as the previous one.


LICENSE OF USE


Any computer program and/or software is subject to these terms and conditions.


If you comply with these terms and conditions, we grant you the right to install and use the services in accordance with the conditions that were contracted.


My Health Life reserves all rights concerning the use of the computer program and/or mobile application.


This license does not give you any rights to; therefore, you may not:


a. Circumvent or omit any technology protection measures in connection with the Services.

 b. Decrypt or emulate any services or aspects included in or connected to the services.

 c. Transfer, sell and/or assign in any way the license of use.

 d. Use the Services in any unauthorized manner that could interfere with other people's use of the Services or gain access to any other Service, Data, or Account.

 e. Allow access to the Services or modify any authorized device by unauthorized third-party applications.


INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY.


The services are registered software with the National Copyright Institute.


MY HEALTH LIFE is a registered commercial trademark with the Mexican Institute of Industrial Property.


The user declares that he is aware that its use, and therefore, does not make him the owner of any of the intellectual property rights thereof.


These terms do not grant you the right to use the trademarks or logos used on our Services.


PAYMENT TERMS


If you purchase a Service, these payment terms apply to your purchase, and you accept them.


Payments could be processed through our platform services, which are available in the user's geographical area. The TERMS AND CONDITIONS of the payment platform will be made available to users on the My Health Life platform.


JURISDICTION


For everything related to the interpretation and compliance with these terms and conditions, you expressly submit to the jurisdiction of the Competent Courts of the City of Tijuana, waiving any other jurisdiction that, because of your domicile or other present or future cause, may correspond to you.

The Diagnosis will generate a categorized summary of your vital signs, showing your current status with color indicators: green (healthy) and orange (possible alteration). Note: This information is for reference only. Consult a doctor if you feel unwell.
